posts.title: My First Post
posts.author: Alice
posts.body: This is the first post. Welcome to my blog where I share thoughts on web development, React, and more!

posts.title: Another Post
posts.author: Bob
posts.body: This is another post. Today I want to discuss how to use Tailwind CSS effectively in React projects.

posts.title: React Router Basics
posts.author: Charlie
posts.body: React Router is a powerful library to handle routing in React apps. Let's explore its core features with examples.

posts.title: Understanding useEffect Hook
posts.author: Diana
posts.body: The useEffect hook lets you perform side effects in React components. This post explains its use and common pitfalls.

posts.title: Styling React Apps with Tailwind
posts.author: Ethan
posts.body: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that works great with React. Here are some tips to get started quickly.
